- [93mQuantifying[0m the [93mpotential[0m [93mgains[0m in [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m from [93meliminating[0m [93mcardiovascular[0m [93mdisease[0m, [93mroad[0m [93mtraffic[0m [93minjuries[0m, and [93mcancers[0m in [93mIran[0m.: [93mBackground[0m: [93mLife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m ([93mLE[0m) [93mserves[0m as a [93mcritical[0m [93mhealth[0m [93mmetric[0m for [93massessing[0m [91mchanges[0m in [93mrisk[0m [93mfactors[0m, [93mhealth[0m [93moutcomes[0m, and the [93meffectiveness[0m of [93mmedical[0m [93mtreatments[0m. This [93mresearch[0m [93msought[0m to [93mdetermine[0m the [93mimpact[0m of [93mcardiovascular[0m [93mdisease[0m, [93mroad[0m [93mtraffic[0m [93maccidents[0m, and [93mall[0m [93mtypes[0m of [93mcancer[0m on the [93mincrease[0m in [93mIranian[0m [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m for the [93myears[0m [93m2010[0m, and [93m2020[0m. [93mMethod[0m: [93mInitial[0m [93mdata[0m on [93mcardiovascular[0m [93mdisease[0m ([93mCVD[0m), [93mall[0m [93mcancers[0m, and [93mroad[0m [93mtraffic[0m [93minjuries[0m ([93mRTI[0m) by [93mage[0m, [93msex[0m, and [93mcalendar[0m [93myear[0m were [93mobtained[0m from the [93mIranian[0m [93mDeath[0m [93mRegistration[0m [92mSystem[0m. [93mPopulation[0m [93mdata[0m [93mcorresponding[0m to these [93mvariables[0m were [93mretrieved[0m from the [93mStatistical[0m [93mCenter[0m of [93mIran[0m. [93mFinally[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mutilized[0m the [93mperiod[0m [93mlife[0m [93mtable[0m to [93mestimate[0m the [93meffects[0m of [93mthree[0m [93mmentioned[0m [93mcauses[0m of [93mdeath[0m on [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m [93mincreases[0m. The [93mdata[0m [93manalysis[0m was [93mconducted[0m [93musing[0m [93mR[0m [92msoftware[0m [93mversion[0m [93m4[0m.[93m2[0m.[93m1[0m. [93mResults[0m: In this [93mstudy[0m, [93mexcluding[0m [93mCVD[0m [93mincreased[0m [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m by [93m5[0m.[93m74[0m [93myears[0m for [93mmen[0m and [93m10[0m.[93m62[0m [93myears[0m for [93mwomen[0m in [93m2010[0m. In that [93mcalendar[0m [93myear[0m, [93mexcluding[0m [93mdeaths[0m from [93mRTIs[0m [93mincreased[0m [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m by [93m0[0m.[93m59[0m [93myears[0m for [93mmen[0m and [93m0[0m.[93m24[0m [93myears[0m for [93mwomen[0m. [93mSimilarly[0m, [93mexcluding[0m [93mcancer[0m [93mincreased[0m [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m by [93m1[0m.[93m31[0m [93myears[0m for [93mmen[0m and [93m1[0m.[93m24[0m [93myears[0m for [93mwomen[0m. In [93m2020[0m, [93mexcluding[0m [93mCVD[0m [93mincreased[0m [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m by [93m4[0m.[93m99[0m [93myears[0m for [93mmen[0m and [93m9[0m.[93m66[0m [93myears[0m for [93mwomen[0m. [93mExcluding[0m [93mroad[0m [93mtraffic[0m [93minjuries[0m [93mincreased[0m [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m by [93m0[0m.[93m46[0m [93myears[0m for [93mmen[0m and [93m0[0m.[93m17[0m [93myears[0m for [93mwomen[0m. [93mExcluding[0m [93mcancer[0m [93mincreased[0m [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m by [93m1[0m.[93m48[0m [93myears[0m for [93mmen[0m and [93m1[0m.[93m39[0m [93myears[0m for [93mwomen[0m. [93mConclusion[0m: [93mOur[0m [93mstudy[0m [93mfound[0m that at the [93mnational[0m [93mlevel[0m, [93meliminating[0m [93mcardiovascular[0m [93mdisease[0m and then [93mcancer[0m [93mhad[0m the [93mgreatest[0m [93mgain[0m in [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m at [93mbirth[0m and at [93mother[0m [93mages[0m. [93mCompared[0m with the [93mother[0m [93mtwo[0m [93moutcomes[0m, the [93melimination[0m of [93mroad[0m [93mtraffic[0m [93mdeaths[0m [93mhad[0m the [93msmallest[0m [93mincrease[0m in [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m.

- [93mScientific[0m [93mproduction[0m in [93mNutrition[0m in the [93mJournal[0m [93mCiência[0m & [93mSaúde[0m [93mColetiva[0m ([93m2020[0m-[93m2024[0m).: This [93marticle[0m [93maimed[0m to [93manalyze[0m the [93mscientific[0m [93mproduction[0m of the [93mJournal[0m [93mCiência[0m & [93mSaúde[0m [93mColetiva[0m ([93mC[0m&[93mSC[0m) in the [93marea[0m of [93mfood[0m and [93mnutrition[0m ([93mF[0m&[93mN[0m) from [93m2020[0m to [93m2024[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mconducted[0m a [93mnarrative[0m [93mreview[0m of the [93marticles[0m [93mpublished[0m in the [93mperiod[0m, and the [93mpublications[0m were [93mentered[0m into a [93mMicrosoft[0m [93mExcel[0m® [93mspreadsheet[0m to [93mextract[0m [93mbibliometric[0m [93mcharacteristics[0m. The [93mdata[0m are [93mpresented[0m in [93mfrequency[0m [93mdistribution[0m [93mtables[0m. [93mSixty[0m-[93msix[0m [93marticles[0m were [93mpublished[0m in the [93m2020[0m-[93m2024[0m [93mperiod[0m, whose [93mthemes[0m were [93mFood[0m [93mConsumption[0m ([93m33[0m.[93m3[0m%), [93mF[0m&[93mN[0m [93mPolicies[0m and [93mPrograms[0m ([93m24[0m.[93m2[0m%), [93mNutritional[0m [93mStatus[0m [93mAssessment[0m ([93m22[0m.[93m7[0m%), [93mEnvironment[0m and [93mFood[0m [92mSystem[0m ([93m13[0m.[93m6[0m%), [93mFood[0m [93mTechnology[0m and [93mLabeling[0m ([93m3[0m.[93m0[0m%), [93mComplementary[0m [94mFeeding[0m ([93m1[0m.[93m5[0m%) and [93mFood[0m and [93mNutrition[0m [93mEducation[0m ([93m1[0m.[93m5[0m%). [93mComparing[0m the [93mpercentage[0m [93mdistribution[0m of [93mtopics[0m with the [93mreview[0m of [93mC[0m&[93mSC[0m [93mpublications[0m between [93m1996[0m and [93m2019[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mobserved[0m an [93mincrease[0m in [93mstudies[0m on [93mFood[0m [93mConsumption[0m, A&[93mN[0m [93mPolicies[0m and [93mPrograms[0m, a [93mdecrease[0m in [93marticles[0m on [93mNutritional[0m [93mStatus[0m [93mAssessment[0m, [93mComplementary[0m [94mFeeding[0m, and [93mFood[0m and [93mNutrition[0m [93mEducation[0m, and a [93mlack[0m of [93mstudies[0m on [93mBreastfeeding[0m. [93mNew[0m [93mareas[0m of [93minterest[0m [93memerged[0m, [93msuch[0m as [93mFood[0m [93mEnvironment[0m and [93mFood[0m [93mTechnology[0m and [93mLabeling[0m.

While [93mwidely[0m [93mused[0m in [93mneurosurgery[0m, [93mvisceral[0m [93msurgery[0m, and [93murology[0m, its [93madoption[0m in [93mspinal[0m [93msurgery[0m [93mremains[0m in [93mdevelopment[0m. This [93mstudy[0m [93mreports[0m the [93mimplementation[0m of [93mrobotic[0m-[93massisted[0m [93mspine[0m [93msurgery[0m within a [93mneurosurgical[0m [93mdepartment[0m, [93mfocusing[0m on the [93mlearning[0m [93mcurve[0m, [93mworkflow[0m [93mintegration[0m, [93mcomplications[0m, and [93mprospects[0m. [93mSuccessful[0m [93mintegration[0m [93mrequires[0m a [93mdedicated[0m [93mtechnical[0m [93minfrastructure[0m and [93mthorough[0m [93mtraining[0m-[93mboth[0m [93mtheoretical[0m and [93mpractical[0m-for the [93mentire[0m [93msurgical[0m [93mteam[0m. [93mCollaboration[0m among [93msurgeons[0m, [93mparamedical[0m [93mstaff[0m, and [93mbiomedical[0m [93mengineers[0m is [93messential[0m to [93moptimize[0m [93moutcomes[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mused[0m a [93mtable[0m-[93mmounted[0m [93mrobotic[0m [92msystem[0m ([93mMazor[0m [93mX[0m [93mStealth[0m [93mEdition[0m, [93mMedtronic[0m), with [93msurgical[0m [93mplanning[0m [93mbased[0m on [93mpreoperative[0m, [93msub[0m-[93mmillimetric[0m [93mbone[0m-[93mdensity[0m [93mCT[0m [93mscans[0m to [93mensure[0m [93mpersonalized[0m [93mcare[0m. From [93mNovember[0m [93m2022[0m to [93mMay[0m [93m2023[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mincluded[0m [93m32[0m [93mpatients[0m with an [93maverage[0m [93mage[0m of [93m58[0m [93my[0m/[93mo[0m ([93mSD[0m [93m15[0m ([93m19[0m; [93m87[0m)) for a [93mtotal[0m of [93m204[0m [93minserted[0m [93mscrews[0m. [93mDegenerative[0m [93mspine[0m [93mrepresented[0m the [93mmain[0m [93mindication[0m [93mfollowed[0m by [93mtumoral[0m [93mspine[0m. [93mOptimal[0m [93maccuracy[0m for [93mpedicle[0m [93mscrew[0m [93mplacement[0m was [93m97[0m % [93mcorresponding[0m to [93mgrade[0m A ([93m90[0m.[93m1[0m%) and [93mgrade[0m [93mB[0m ([93m6[0m.[93m9[0m%) from [93mGRS[0m. The [93moperating[0m [93mtime[0m was of [93m186[0m.[93m7[0m [93mmin[0m ([93mSD[0m [93m89[0m.[93m7[0m ([93m45[0m; [93m386[0m)) and the [93maverage[0m [93mfluoroscopy[0m [93mtime[0m [93mper[0m [93mscrew[0m was of [93m3[0m.[93m0[0m [93ms[0m ([93m1[0m.[93m8[0m-[93m5[0m.[93m5[0m). [93mInstallation[0m is a [93mtime[0m-[93mconsuming[0m [93mstep[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mobserved[0m a [93mtrend[0m [93mtowards[0m [93mshorter[0m [93moperating[0m [93mtimes[0m as [93mmore[0m [93mcases[0m are [93moperated[0m on. Only [93m2[0m [93msuperficial[0m [93mskin[0m [93minfections[0m were [93mreported[0m, with no [93mother[0m [93mcomplication[0m. [93mRobotic[0m [93mspine[0m [93msurgery[0m [93mimproves[0m [93mstandardization[0m, [93menhances[0m [93maccuracy[0m, and [93mpromotes[0m [93mpersonalized[0m [93mmedicine[0m, with [93mpotential[0m for [93mfurther[0m [93mworkflow[0m [93moptimization[0m.

- [93mHuman[0m [93mbite[0m [93mcases[0m [93mreported[0m to [93mhealth[0m [93mfacilities[0m in the [93mVolta[0m [93mregion[0m of [93mGhana[0m, [93m2019[0m to [93m2023[0m.: [93mIntroduction[0m: [93mAlthough[0m [93mhuman[0m [93mbite[0m [93minjuries[0m [93moccur[0m [93mless[0m [93mfrequently[0m than [93mother[0m [93mtypes[0m of [93minjuries[0m, [93mthey[0m [93mpresent[0m [93mnotable[0m [93mpublic[0m [93mhealth[0m [93mchallenges[0m, [93myet[0m [93mthey[0m [93mhave[0m [93mreceived[0m [93mrelatively[0m [93mlittle[0m [93mattention[0m. This [93mstudy[0m [93mexamined[0m the [93mincidence[0m, [93mtrend[0m, and [93mdistribution[0m of [93mhuman[0m [93mbite[0m [93minjuries[0m in the [93mVolta[0m [93mRegion[0m of [93mGhana[0m from [93m2019[0m to [93m2023[0m. [93mMethod[0m: A [93mretrospective[0m [93manalysis[0m of [93mhuman[0m [93mbite[0m [93minjury[0m [93mdata[0m from the [93mDistrict[0m [93mHealth[0m [93mInformation[0m [33mManagement[0m [92mSystem[0m [93m2[0m ([93mDHIMS[0m-[93m2[0m) for the [93mVolta[0m [93mRegion[0m was [93mconducted[0m for the [93mperiod[0m [93m2019[0m to [93m2023[0m. [93mData[0m on [93mhuman[0m [93mbite[0m [93minjuries[0m were [93mobtained[0m from the [93mmonthly[0m [93moutpatient[0m ([93mOPD[0m) [93mmorbidity[0m [93mreport[0m [93mform[0m. [93mVariables[0m [93mavailable[0m and [93mextracted[0m were [93mage[0m, [93msex[0m, [93mdistrict[0m and [93myear[0m of [93mreport[0m. The [93mdata[0m was [93manalyzed[0m [93mdescriptively[0m [93musing[0m [93mMicrosoft[0m [93mExcel[0m and [93mQuantum[0m [93mGeographic[0m [93mInformation[0m [92mSystem[0m ([93mQGIS[0m) and the [93mfindings[0m [93mpresented[0m in [93mtables[0m and [93mgraphs[0m. [93mResult[0m: A [93mtotal[0m of [93m931[0m [93mhuman[0m [93mbite[0m [93minjuries[0m were [93mreported[0m to [93mhealth[0m [93mfacilities[0m from [93m2019[0m to [93m2023[0m, with the [93mhighest[0m [93mincidence[0m of [93m12[0m.[93m0[0m [93mper[0m [93m100[0m,[93m000[0m [93mrecorded[0m in [93m2021[0m and the [93mlowest[0m, [93m9[0m.[93m7[0m [93mper[0m [93m100[0m,[93m000[0m in [93m2019[0m. [93mMales[0m and [93myoung[0m [93madults[0m between the [93mages[0m of [93m18[0m-[93m34[0m [93maccounted[0m for [93m58[0m.[93m1[0m and [93m41[0m.[93m1[0m%, [93mrespectively[0m of [93mall[0m [93mcases[0m [93mreported[0m. [93mGeographically[0m, [93mKetu[0m [93mNorth[0m [93mrecorded[0m the [93mhighest[0m [93mnumber[0m of [93mcases[0m, [93m184[0m ([93m19[0m.[93m8[0m%). [93mThere[0m [93mwe[0m no [93mreported[0m [93mdeath[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mhuman[0m [93mbite[0m. [93mConclusion[0m: [93mHuman[0m [93mbite[0m [93minjuries[0m in the [93mVolta[0m [93mRegion[0m [93mhave[0m [93mshown[0m an [93mupward[0m [93mtrend[0m over the [93myears[0m [93mstudied[0m, with [93mmales[0m and [93myoung[0m [93madults[0m [93maged[0m [93m18[0m to [93m34[0m [93myears[0m [93maffected[0m in the [93mmajority[0m of the [93mreported[0m [93mcases[0m. While the [93mcauses[0m and [93minfection[0m [93moutcomes[0m were not [93mdetermined[0m, this [93mstudy[0m [93mprovides[0m [93messential[0m [93mbaseline[0m [93mdata[0m for [93mfurther[0m [93mresearch[0m into the [93mcauses[0m and [93meffects[0m of these [93minjuries[0m.
- [93mLiquid[0m–[93mliquid[0m [93mtransition[0m in [93melemental[0m [93mliquids[0m [95minvestigated[0m by [93msound[0m [93mvelocity[0m [93mmeasurements[0m: [93mtrends[0m in the [93mperiodic[0m [93mtable[0m: [93mAbstract[0m The [93mvelocity[0m of [93msound[0m [93mhas[0m been [93mmeasured[0m as a [93mfunction[0m of [93mtemperature[0m to [95minvestigate[0m [93mstructural[0m [91mchanges[0m in the [93mmolten[0m As–[93mSb[0m [93malloy[0m.
